title: Green Dragonborn
content:
RESISTENCE. You have the type of damage resistance associated with your ancient dragon.

LANGUAGES. You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic. The Draconic language is known to be one of the oldest languages and is still used in the study of magic. The language sounds harsh to most creatures, including several consonants and tight syllables.

Green Dragonborn Lore:

The green dragonborn are a race of proud and honorable warriors, descended from an empire that strove for world dominatio
